channel.title: joel on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in joel on Barefoot Rob

item.title: great chat with Joel
item.description: 15:51 Monday 01 October 2018 JST I met Joel for lunch in Roppongi today. Ate at a falafel cafe near Almond. It was vegan delicious! Great to catch up with him and share stories about how we are doing in Tokyo!

item.title: Joel (hopefully) fixed MT3 website top banner
item.description: 18:08 Monday 17 September 2018 JST I chatted with Joel today after doing a livestream on Facebook about work-life-balance. He tweaked the theme for Marble Track 3 to fix the jumbotron at the top! Super awesome. Going to try it out now. Original:
